CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Autonomous Vehicles relative to International Freight?
SRP.A: Autonomous Vehicles is {below} International Freight in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing International Freight relative to Rural Logistics?
SRP.A: International Freight is {above} Rural Logistics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Drone Delivery relative to International Freight?
SRP.A: Drone Delivery is {below} International Freight in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Drone Delivery}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {International Freight}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Rural Logistics's maximum Delivery Time in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Rural Logistics's maximum Delivery Time is in {1968}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Rural Logistics's minimum Delivery Time in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Rural Logistics's minimum Delivery Time is in {1954}.

NC.Q: Between 1951 and 1958, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1952 and 1957?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1951 and 1958 was {larger} than between 1952 and 1957.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1965, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1954 and 1965?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1960 and 1965 was {smaller} than between 1954 and 1965.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1968, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1953 and 1965?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1959 and 1968 was {larger} than between 1953 and 1965.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1959, was the average total Delivery Time higher or lower than between 1956 and 1967?
NC.A: The average total delivery time between 1952 and 1959 was {lower} than between 1956 and 1967.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Autonomous Vehicles} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Rural Logistics and International Freight first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Rural Logistics and International Freight first exchanged leading positions in {1952}.
